ud1.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava pavayam viharati ajakalapake cetiye, ajakalapakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
ud1.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava rattandhakaratimisayam abbhokase nisinno hoti; devo ca ekamekam phusayati.
ud1.7:1.4: Atha kho ajakalapako yakkho bhagavato bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato avidure tikkhattum “akkulo pakkulo”ti akkulapakkulikam akasi:
ud1.7:2.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
